EnterMnemonicRemind: Type in Mnemonic Phrases, separate with spaces
ScreenshotsRemind001: Anyone in possession of your Mnemonic Phrases will have access to your assets！
ScreenshotsRemind002: Mnemonic appears only here and only once. Please write the is down and keep it safe.
NewWalletRemind001: Password is used for protecting your Private Key, Transactions etc. It is critical for the security of your wallet.
NewWalletRemind002: Your password is not stored and cannot be retrieved by QuickWallet, please backup and keep it in mind.
PreBackupRemind: Please write down the Mnemonic Phrase, It will be required for subsequent verification process.
BackupRemind: Please select the Mnemonic Phrase in the correct order.
ImportMnemonicRemind: You can reset the wallet password when it is imported with Mnemonic Phrase.
ImportPrivateKeyRemind: Enter the Private Key into the box blow. Or scan the QR Code generated by the Private Key. Please pay attention to character case.
ImportRemind: After setting the new password, the old password will be invalid after importing the account。
ExportRemind001: Anyone in possession if your Mnemonic Phrase will have access to your Assets,please keep it safe
ExportRemind002: Make sure there are no other people or cameras around
LogoutRemind: You are about to logout the account. Please make sure that all the unspent recharge amount in each game has been successfully withdrawn and credited to the account.
ConfirmRemind001: I have carefully read and agree to the above terms and conditions
ScanRemind: Align Camera to the QR Code to Scan
SignMessage: The following message requires this account signature
UnLoginRemind: You are not logged into the wallet
LackBalanceError: 转账金额应小于当前余额
InvalidAddressError: 请输入有效的收款地址
